hours_text:
## Hours & Pricing

#### _Closed on all national holidays unless otherwise noted._

* * *

### **Sullivan Brothers Iowa Veterans Museum & Grout Museum of History & Science**

**503 South Street, Waterloo, IA 50701  
  
Winter Hours: November 1-April 30, 10AM-4PM **  
  
Spring-Fall Hours: May 1 - October 31: Tuesday-Saturday, 10AM-5PM

**Museum Only Cost:** $15 Adults, $8 Veterans & Children 4-13, 3 & Under & Museum Members Free  
  
**Museum & [Norris Corson Family Planetarium](https://www.groutmuseumdistrict.org/visit/visit/planetarium.aspx) Cost:** $20 Adults, $13 Veterans & Children 4-13, 3 & Under & Museum Members Free  
  
**Planetarium Only Cost:** $8 Adults & Children, $5 Veterans

**College Students with University ID:** $8 

* * *

### **Rensselaer Russell House Museum**

**520 W. 3rd Street, Waterloo, IA 50701  
Hours:**_**** By Appointment Only_

**Cost:** Guided Tour**** $15/per person 

* * *

### Grout Museum District's Archives & Library

** _The library is open for research by appointment only._** The library is not part of the regular museum admission. To schedule research access, please contact Catreva Manning at 319-234-6357 or [catreva.manning@gmdistrict.org](mailto:catreva.manning@gmdistrict.org).  
  
**Pricing:**

  * Reading Room Fee: $5
  * 0-15 Minute Requests: Complementary
  * 15-30 Minute Requests: $10 (one time fee)
  * Requests that Take Over 30 Minutes: $20 per hour

* * *

Through the [ _Museums For All Program_](https://museums4all.org/), pr...
